i-geometry eyinkimbinkimbi: Ucwaningo lwezakhiwo zejometri nezakhiwo ezivela, noma ezichazwe, izinombolo eziyinkimbinkimbi
izinombolo eziyinkimbinkimbi: Izinombolo zefomu elithi a + bi lapho u-a no-b kuyizinombolo zangempela
ingxenye yangempela: Itemu enombolweni eyinkimbinkimbi engenayo iyunithi ecatshangwayo njengesici
ingxenye ecatshangelwayo: Ingxenye yenombolo eyinkimbinkimbi eneyunithi ecatshangwayo njengesici
izinhlobonhlobo eziyinkimbinkimbi: Izikhala zejiyomethri eyinkimbinkimbi ezihlanganisa amajika nezindawo
izinhlobo eziyinkimbinkimbi ze-algebraic: Izikhala zejometri eyinkimbinkimbi eziyizixazululo zezibalo ze-polynomial
Uhlelo oluncane lwemodeli: Uhlelo lwejometri eyinkimbinkimbi yokuhlukaniswa kwezinhlobonhlobo eziyinkimbinkimbi nezinhlobonhlobo ze-algebraic
izikhala module: Izikhala zejometri eyinkimbinkimbi ehlukanisa uhlobo oluthile lwento yejometri
ukucabanga kwe-calabi: Umcabango wejiyomethri eyinkimbinkimbi efakazelwe ngu-Shing-Tung Yau mayelana nokuba khona kohlobo olukhethekile lwemethrikhi ku-manifold eyinkimbinkimbi.
hitchin-kobayashi izincwadi: Ukuxhumana kwejiyomethri eyinkimbinkimbi phakathi kwenqwaba ye-holomorphic vector ezinzile kanye nezixazululo zezibalo ezithile ezihlukile
ukuxhumana kwe-nonabelian hodge: Ukuxhumana kwejiyomethri eyinkimbinkimbi phakathi kwezinhlobo ezithile zezinhlobonhlobo eziyinkimbinkimbi nezinhlobo ezithile zezakhiwo ze-algebra
kahler-einstein metrics: Izinhlobo ezikhethekile zamamethrikhi ku-manifold eyinkimbinkimbi enelisa isimo esithile
